name: Mistaken Story
description:
Made by Zach Harris @ Confictura Studios for the 2018 Epic Mega Jam

A short story based game about the hero of a book. The hero must put the story back together after it was broken apart by his old rival. Collect your memories scattered around town and find out the full story of what happened!

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Space Bar: Jump

E Key: Interact with books

Tab: Pause

Esc:  Quit to Main Menu

Left Mouse: Proceed through dialogue
